00041 CParticleFilter::~CParticleFilter()
00042 {
00043    for (int i=0; i<num_variables; i++)
00044    {
00045        delete particles[i];
00046        delete A[i];
00047    }
00048    delete particles;

00054 void CParticleFilter::Predict()
00055 {
00056      cout<<"predict start"<<endl;
00057      double *temp;
00058      temp=new double[num_variables];
00059 
00060      for (int n_part=0; n_part<num_particles; n_part++)
00061      {
00062         ProjectParticle( n_part);
00065          noise(rand_num,var_modelo,num_variables);
00066 
00067          for(int n_var=0; n_var<num_variables;n_var++)
00068          {
00069              temp[n_var]=0;
00070              for (int n_var2=0; n_var2<num_variables;n_var2++)
00071              {
00073                  temp[n_var]+=A[n_var][n_var2]*particles[n_var2][n_part];
00074              }
00075              temp[n_var]+=rand_num[n_var];
00076              cout<<"rand_num "<<rand_num[n_var]<<" var "<<var_modelo[n_var]<<endl;
00077          }
00078          for (int n_var=0;n_var<num_variables;n_var++){
00079 //             cout<<"particle old "<<particles[n_var][n_part];
00080              particles[n_var][n_part]=temp[n_var];
00081 //             cout<<" new "<<particles[n_var][n_part]<<endl;
00082          }
00083      }
00084      cout<<"predict stop"<<endl;
00085      delete[] temp;
00086 }

00283 double CParticleFilter::Random(double min, double max)
00284 {
00285         double range= max-min;
00286         return (range*rand()/RAND_MAX)+min;
00287 }

00303 void CParticleFilter::setModel(CModel *p)
00304 {
00305     cout<<"start set model"<< endl;
00306   pModel = p;
00307 
00308   for (int i =0;i<num_max_variables;i++)
00309       for(int j=0;j<num_max_variables;j++){
00310           if (i==j) A[i][j]=1;
00311           else A[i][j]=0;
00312       }
00313   for (int i =0; i<pModel->getStateNum();i++)
00314       for (int j=0; j<pModel->getStateNum();j++){
00315           A[i][j]=cvmGet(pModel->getTransitionMatrix(),i,j);
00316       }
00317 
00318   for (int i=0; i<pModel->getStateNum();i++)
00319       var_modelo[i]=cvmGet(pModel->getProcessNoiseCov(),i,i);
00320 
00321   if(pModel->getMeasurementNum()>0){
00325       printf ("ERROR no implementado el soporte para medida en vehículo\n");
00326       exit (0);
00327   }
00328   cout<<"end set model" <<endl;
00329 }
00330 void CParticleFilter::noise(double *v, double *s, int l)
00331 {
00332      int ii=0;
00333      double p;
00334      double raiz_2=sqrt(2);
00335      for (int i =0; i<l; i++){
00336          ii=0;
00337          p=rand()/(RAND_MAX + 1.0);
00338          cout<<"noise p "<<p<<endl;
00339          while (ERF[ii]<(2*p-1)&&(ii<200)) ii++;
00340          cout<<"noise ERF["<<ii<<"] "<<ERF[ii]<<endl;
00341          double m = 0;
00342          v[i]=m+s[i]*raiz_2*((ii-100)/50.0);
00343          cout<<"noise s "<<s[i]<<" v "<<v[i]<<endl;
00344      }
00345 }
00346 void CParticleFilter::UpdateMatrixSize()
00347 {
00348   inited_vis=0;
00349   inited_no_vis=0;
00350 
00351   for ( list<CElempunto*>::iterator It=pMap->bbdd.begin();
00352         It != pMap->bbdd.end(); It++ )
00353     {
00354       if ((*It)->state==st_inited){
00355         inited_vis++;
00356       }
00357       if ((*It)->state==st_no_view){
00358         inited_no_vis++;
00359       }
00360     }
00361   num_measurements=inited_vis*2+pModel->getMeasurementNum();
00362   num_variables=(inited_no_vis+inited_vis)*fdims+pModel->getStateNum();
00363 
00364 }
